an9.12:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an9.12:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
an9.12:1.5: yannunaham yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankameyyan”ti.
an9.12:1.6: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankami; upasankamitva tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim sammodi.
an9.12:1.7: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
an9.12:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
an9.12:2.2: “yo hi koci, avuso, saupadiseso kalam karoti, sabbo so aparimutto niraya aparimutto tiracchanayoniya aparimutto pettivisaya aparimutto apayaduggativinipata”ti.
an9.12:2.3: Atha kho ayasma sariputto tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam bhasitam neva abhinandi nappatikkosi.
an9.12:2.6: Atha kho ayasma sariputto savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.12:3.1: “Idhaham, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisim.
an9.12:3.4: yannunaham yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankameyyan’ti.
an9.12:3.5: Atha kho aham, bhante, yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankamim; upasankamitva tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim sammodim.
an9.12:3.6: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidim.
an9.12:3.7: Tena kho pana samayena tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
an9.12:3.8: ‘yo hi koci, avuso, saupadiseso kalam karoti, sabbo so aparimutto niraya aparimutto tiracchanayoniya aparimutto pettivisaya aparimutto apayaduggativinipata’ti.
an9.12:3.9: Atha kho aham, bhante, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam bhasitam neva abhinandim nappatikkosim.
an9.12:4.1: “Ke ca, sariputta, annatitthiya paribbajaka bala abyatta, ke ca saupadisesam va ‘saupadiseso’ti janissanti, anupadisesam va ‘anupadiseso’ti janissanti.
an9.12:5.1: Navayime, sariputta, puggala saupadisesa kalam kurumana parimutta niraya parimutta tiracchanayoniya parimutta pettivisaya parimutta apayaduggativinipata.
an9.12:5.3: Idha, sariputta, ekacco puggalo silesu paripurakari hoti, samadhismim paripurakari, pannaya mattaso kari.
an9.12:5.4: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya antaraparinibbayi hoti.
an9.12:5.5: Ayam, sariputta, pathamo puggalo saupadiseso kalam kurumano parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
an9.12:6.1: Puna caparam, sariputta, idhekacco puggalo silesu paripurakari hoti, samadhismim paripurakari, pannaya mattaso kari.
an9.12:6.2: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya upahaccaparinibbayi hoti …pe…
an9.12:6.8: Ayam, sariputta, pancamo puggalo saupadiseso kalam kurumano parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
an9.12:7.1: Puna caparam, sariputta, idhekacco puggalo silesu paripurakari hoti, samadhismim mattaso kari, pannaya mattaso kari.
an9.12:7.2: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami hoti, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karoti.
an9.12:7.3: Ayam, sariputta, chattho puggalo saupadiseso kalam kurumano parimutto niraya …pe… parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
an9.12:8.1: Puna caparam, sariputta, idhekacco puggalo silesu paripurakari hoti, samadhismim mattaso kari, pannaya mattaso kari.
an9.12:8.2: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ekabiji hoti, ekamyeva manusakam bhavam nibbattetva dukkhassantam karoti.
an9.12:8.3: Ayam, sariputta, sattamo puggalo saupadiseso kalam kurumano parimutto niraya …pe… parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
an9.12:9.1: Puna caparam, sariputta, idhekacco puggalo silesu paripurakari hoti, samadhismim mattaso kari, pannaya mattaso kari.
an9.12:9.2: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya kolankolo hoti, dve va tini va kulani sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karoti.
an9.12:9.3: Ayam, sariputta, atthamo puggalo saupadiseso kalam kurumano parimutto niraya …pe… parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
an9.12:10.1: Puna caparam, sariputta, idhekacco puggalo silesu paripurakari hoti, samadhismim mattaso kari, pannaya mattaso kari.
an9.12:10.2: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sattakkhattuparamo hoti, sattakkhattuparamam deve ca manusse ca sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karoti.
an9.12:10.3: Ayam, sariputta, navamo puggalo saupadiseso kalam kurumano parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
an9.12:11.1: Ke ca, sariputta, annatitthiya paribbajaka bala abyatta, ke ca saupadisesam va ‘saupadiseso’ti janissanti, anupadisesam va ‘anupadiseso’ti janissanti.
an9.12:11.2: Ime kho, sariputta, nava puggala saupadisesa kalam kurumana parimutta niraya parimutta tiracchanayoniya parimutta pettivisaya parimutta apayaduggativinipata.
an9.12:11.3: Na tavayam, sariputta, dhammapariyayo patibhasi bhikkhunam bhikkhuninam upasakanam upasikanam.
an9.12:11.6: Api ca maya, sariputta, dhammapariyayo panhadhippayena bhasito”ti.
